name: Worm Putridness Level 01 (alpha)
description:
Alpha version of the first level, try to go through one floor of the office space and not die. The game has roguelike elements, try to find the best way to pass. The link below is the training level https://chamfear.itch.io/worm-putridness

Discord https://discord.gg/6tZY6Jk
